rules_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Scourge of the Moors attacks, teach target creature you control deathtouch. [i](Put a counter of that kind on it. If it already has that ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
Whenever one or more creatures with deathtouch you control deal 7 or more total combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.
